Comments_List: I gained a relatively deep understanding of the global financial system from 1945 onward.

Surprisingly, I actually found the diversity of viewpoints in the course to be quite refreshing and helpfuldefinitely some more conservative elements in the course but that just made discussions more interesting and worthwhile.  

The presentations weren't that helpful; they just encouraged people to read less before coming to class.  I would probably recommend less reading and no presentations so that discussion could hone a little closer to the text instead of veering off into tangential topics as sometimes happened.
